help.description: Displays a list of commands available.

invite.description: DM's the user a bot invite link so they can add me to their Discord server.

say.description: I will send the arguments provided in a message.

userinfo.description: Displays information about the user provided in the User ID. Leave the User ID blank to display information about yourself.

owner.description: Promotes the provided user to Owner.

admin.description: Promotes the provided user to Admin.

giveperm.description: Gives a permission to the specified user.

announce.description: Sends an announcement across all servers that the bot is in.

version.description: Displays the version of software Starlow is running.
